roleset.name: not having a job
roleset.note: UNEMPLOYED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, employ-v.01, employed-j.01. (from unemployed.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Back when-1 I was unemployed [*-1] and sought out private health insurance , as a single male I had to buy coverage that included pregnancy , go figure .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: I was unemployed as a phlebotomist when the company was shut down and 1500 of us were laid off.
example.arg: when the company was shut down and 1500 of us were laid off
